Description: Ostracon, fragment of the upper-body of a buff-coloured pottery wine-jar, the fabric contains many small white inclusions, the exterior is covered with a cream-coloured slip and faint traces of one line of black-painted hieratic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393547) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393547)
